thread.title: State House Again Defeats Wolf Tax Increase, Say Hahn (RoseMarie Swanger)
thread.title_full: State House Again Defeats Wolf Tax Increase, Say Hahn (RoseMarie Swanger) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: State House Again Defeats Wolf Tax Increase, Say Hahn (RoseMarie Swanger)
text: ( Source : RoseMarie Swanger ) HARRISBURG - State Rep. Marcia Hahn (R-Wind Gap) joined the majority of her House colleagues Wednesday in defeating Gov. Tom Wolf 's attempt to raise taxes by $3.8 billion over two years. In pursuing what would
